tool_description: Analyzes trajectory smoothness using multiple metrics including jerk, curvature, and continuity measures for motion quality assessment.

trajectory.description: Trajectory data as flattened joint positions

num_joints.description: Number of joints per trajectory point

time_step.description: Time interval between trajectory points in seconds

metrics.description: Smoothness metrics to compute: jerk, curvature, continuity, acceleration_variance

error_messages: Invalid trajectory format: trajectory length must be divisible by num_joints with at least 3 points.
Invalid time step: time_step must be positive and less than 1.0 seconds.
Invalid joint count: num_joints must be between 3 and 10.
Unsupported metric: Use jerk, curvature, continuity, or acceleration_variance.
usage: Provide trajectory as flattened joint positions, num_joints, time_step, and optional metrics list. Returns comprehensive smoothness analysis.

overall_smoothness_score.description: Combined smoothness score (0-100, higher is smoother)

jerk_metrics.description: RMS jerk values for each joint

curvature_metrics.description: Maximum curvature values for each joint

discontinuities_detected.description: Number of discontinuities found in trajectory

problem_regions.description: Trajectory point indices with smoothness issues
